meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>law</kanji> <kanji>courts</kanji> are the <vocabulary>court</vocabulary>s you visit to get law distributed. The room in which you do this in is a <vocabulary>courtroom</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
